TEXT.TITLE: UAP MAKES ACQUISITIONS
TEXT.BODY: <UAP Inc> said it has acquired Slater Auto Electric Ltd, with two Ontario stores, and United Diesel Engine Parts Ltd, of Dartmouth, Nova Scotia, for undisclosed terms. It said the transactions, together with acquisitions earlier this year, will increase its annual sales by about 4.5 mln dlrs. Reuter
